content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_block
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 64, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 26, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 10, "index": 37}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 55, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft an iron_block, I need to place 9 iron_ingot in the crafting grid. The first iron_ingot is at slot 28, so I will move it to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
